channel.title: [Source][VB] Anti-RSRedirection
channel.description:
Well, what this does it when you load an rs webpage (which isn't the main page) it will stop it from redirecting to the mainpage.
[code]Private Sub YourWebBrowser_BeforeNavigate2(ByVal pDisp As Object, URL As Variant, Flags As Variant, TargetFrameName As Variant, PostData As Variant, Headers As Variant, Cancel As Boolean) On Error Resume Next If URL = "http://www.runescape.com/" Then Cancel = True End Sub[/code]
(I didn't make this, dunno who did either, but it's usefull)

item.title: [Source][VB] Anti-RSRedirection
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Well, what this does it when you load an rs webpage (which isn't the main page) it will stop it from redirecting to the mainpage.

Private Sub YourWebBrowser_BeforeNavigate2(ByVal pDisp As Object, URL As Variant, Flags As Variant, TargetFrameName As Variant, PostData As Variant, Headers As Variant, Cancel As Boolean)
    On Error Resume Next
    If URL = "http://www.runescape.com/" Then Cancel = True
End Sub

(I didn't make this, dunno who did either, but it's usefull)

Read full topic
